content.question: ​If <math alttext="m equals log subscript 3 81"><semantics><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>81</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, which of the following is also true?

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
